data.title: Locations < Eastern Washington University
data.text:
Eastern Washington University

526 5th Street, Cheney, WA 99004

EWU is located in the inland northwest and known for its scenic beauty and impressive array of recreational and entertainment activities. The university is situated on a 300-acre residential campus in Cheney, in close proximity to Spokane, a metropolitan area of more than 593,000 people, located 275 miles east of Seattle. Spokane is the heart of a region that offers students extensive opportunities for internships, research and collaboration with industries, businesses, agencies, and schools.

EWU Spokane

Eastern Washington University is an integral part of Spokaneâ€™s University District. Located just east of the downtown business core, the University District includes the following facilities:

Catalyst Building

601 E. Riverside Ave., Spokane, WA 99202

Located on the south landing of the University District Gateway Bridge in Spokane, the Catalyst is home to several EWU programs: Addiction Studies, Business, Computer Science, Creative Writing, Cybersecurity, Design, Electrical Engineering, Healthcare Administration, Professional Accounting, Public Administration, Public Health, Social Work, and Urban and Regional Planning.

Health Sciences Building

310 N. Riverpoint Blvd., Spokane, WA 99202

The Health Sciences Building houses four state-of-the-art Eastern programs in the College of Health Science and Public Health: Occupational Therapy; Physical Therapy; Dental Hygiene; and RIDE (Regional Initiatives in Dental Education).

SIERR Building

850 East Spokane Falls Blvd., Spokane, WA 99202

The SIERR Building houses the School of Nursing and the Communication Sciences and Disorders program and is part of the growing Health Peninsula in Spokane. This unique location creates the optimal hub for research, development, and advancement of health sciences and builds upon partnerships with nearby hospitals, clinics, and health education centers to create a comprehensive learning experience.

EWU has sites across the state with the main facility in Cheney, Washington.

Current off-campus program locations include the following:

Bellevue College 3000 Landerholm Circle SE, Bellevue, WA 98007

Everett University Center, 915 N. Broadway, Everett, WA 98201

Statewide Locations for Eastern

In addition to the programs located in Cheney, Spokane, and Bellevue, Eastern provides several high-demand programs to other areas in Washington.

Eastern Washington University (EWU) at Bellevue College (BC)

425.564.5100

email

EWU and BC are collaborating to serve the BC student body and regional population with career advancement opportunities through high-quality baccalaureate degree completion programs.
